org.freezedry.persistence.readers

Class ReaderInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.freezedry.persistence.readers.ReaderInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ReaderInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    This class converts PersistenceReader to InputStream. It works by converting the characters to the encoding specified in constructor parameter.
